backend/main.mo: Main Motoko actor implementing a banking backend with user profile management and wallet operations (deposit, withdrawal, transfer), protected by role-based access control via AccessControl and MixinAuthorization mixins.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping implemented features (dashboard redesign, virtual card, quick actions, transaction list, etc.) to their corresponding source files, components, and test IDs with confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON dictionary providing one-line summaries of every frontend source file, serving as a reference index for the project's React components, pages, hooks, and utilities.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind CSS entry point defining CSS custom property design tokens for light and dark themes including colors, radius, chart palette, and sidebar variables.
frontend/index.html: Minimal HTML shell for the BlueStone Bank React SPA, mounting the app into a root div and loading the main TypeScript entry point as an ES module.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root application file that configures TanStack Router with all page routes, wraps the app in ThemeProvider and Toaster, and renders a two-panel branded LoginPortal when the user is unauthenticated.
frontend/src/components/AccountsOverview: Dashboard component that displays Checking and Savings account cards with navy gradient styling, masked account numbers, live balance fetched via React Query, and loading skeletons.
frontend/src/components/BalanceCard.tsx: Displays a styled bank balance card with a toggle to show/hide the balance amount, decorative UI elements, and a static account number hint.
frontend/src/components/DepositForm.tsx: Form component for submitting a deposit with amount and optional description fields, including validation and a confirmation dialog before executing the transaction.
frontend/src/components/Layout.tsx: Main app layout wrapper providing a sticky header with navigation links and login button (desktop and mobile), a main content area, and a footer.
frontend/src/components/LoginButton.tsx: Button component that handles Internet Identity login and logout, showing appropriate loading/authenticated states and clearing the React Query cache on logout.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupModa: Modal dialog for first-time users to create a profile by entering name, email, and password, with validation and submission via the saveCallerUserProfile mutation.
frontend/src/components/QuickActions.tsx: Grid of quick-action buttons for Transfer, Deposit, Bill Pay, and Top-up, navigating to the relevant route or showing a 'coming soon' toast for unimplemented features.
frontend/src/components/RecentTransactio: Displays a list of recent transactions with type-specific icons and color-coded amounts, showing skeleton placeholders while loading and an empty state when no transactions exist.
frontend/src/components/TransactionConfi: An alert dialog component that displays transaction details (type, amount, recipient, description) for user confirmation before processing, with a loading state during submission.
frontend/src/components/TransactionFilte: A card component providing two select dropdowns to filter transactions by type (all/deposit/withdrawal/transfer) and sort them by date or amount.
frontend/src/components/TransactionTable: Renders a table of transactions with type icons, badges, descriptions, formatted dates, and color-coded amounts; shows an empty state message when no transactions exist.
frontend/src/components/TransferForm.tsx: A form for initiating fund transfers that validates recipient Principal ID and amount, then shows a confirmation dialog before executing the transfer mutation and navigating home on success.
frontend/src/components/VirtualCard.tsx: A flippable virtual credit card UI component displaying cardholder name, masked card number, expiry, and a chip graphic with front/back faces toggled on click.
frontend/src/components/WithdrawForm.tsx: A form for submitting withdrawal requests that validates the amount, shows a confirmation dialog, and navigates home after a successful withdrawal mutation.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: A hook that creates and caches an authenticated or anonymous backend actor using React Query, invalidating dependent queries whenever the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useBalance.ts: A React Query hook that fetches the current user's account balance from the backend actor, enabled only when the actor is ready.
frontend/src/hooks/useFilteredTransactio: A hook that manages filter-by-type and sort-by state, returning a memoized filtered and sorted subset of the provided transactions array.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides a React context and hook for Internet Identity authentication, managing login/logout state and persisting identity via AuthClient.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query mutations for account initialization, deposit, withdrawal, and transfer operations, invalidating balance and transaction caches on success.
frontend/src/hooks/useTransactions.ts: Exports a React Query hook that fetches the list of transactions from the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useUserProfile.ts: Provides React Query hooks to fetch and save the caller's user profile via the backend actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines global Tailwind CSS styles and CSS custom properties for the BlueStone Bank dark-navy/gold design system, including light/dark themes and card-flip animations.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that renders the React app wrapped with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/pages/Dashboard.tsx: Main dashboard page displaying balance, virtual card, accounts overview, quick actions, and recent transactions, with automatic account initialization if needed.
frontend/src/pages/DepositPage.tsx: Page that renders the DepositForm component with a back-navigation button for adding funds to the wallet.
frontend/src/pages/TransactionHistory.ts: Page that displays a filterable and sortable table of all user transactions fetched from the backend.
frontend/src/pages/TransferPage.tsx: Page that renders the TransferForm component with a back-navigation button for sending funds to another user.
frontend/src/pages/WithdrawPage.tsx: Page that renders the WithdrawForm component with a back-navigation button for removing funds from the wallet.
frontend/src/utils/formatters.ts: Utility functions for formatting currency amounts (bigint cents to USD string), nanosecond timestamps to locale date strings, and capitalizing transaction type labels.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for reading URL parameters from both query strings and hash-based routing, with helpers to persist, retrieve, and clear those parameters via sessionStorage and history.replaceState.
frontend/src/utils/validation.ts: Provides validation functions for amount, Principal ID, and email inputs, each returning a ValidationResult object with an isValid flag and optional error message.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration for the frontend, extending the default theme with custom colors (navy, gold, chart palette), border radii, box shadows, fonts, and keyframe animations, plus typography, container-queries, and animate plugins.
project_state.json: Tracks the current state of the BlueStone Bank app project, listing implemented features (dashboard balance, virtual card, quick actions, transactions, multi-account overview), architectural notes, known issues, and image requirements.
